Furniture Assembly

ONIITO provides professional furniture assembly across New York City. We assemble indoor and outdoor sets — buffets, sofas, wardrobes, patio sections — with precision, alignment, and care. Every project ends clean, leveled, and ready to use.

What you get

  • Accurate assembly — aligned doors, leveled surfaces, quiet hinges.
  • Clean workspace — no dust, no packaging left behind.
  • Indoor & outdoor furniture — sofas, cabinets, tables, patio sets.
  • Ready-to-use results — stable, safe, and perfectly adjusted.

 

Recent work

Sideboard assembly

Cabinet assembled square, doors adjusted for even gaps, hinges balanced, glass panels aligned, and handles leveled — stable and clean result.

Outdoor sectional setup

Patio sofa modules connected and tightened, feet leveled on terrace tiles, cushions fitted precisely — balanced and comfortable seating zone.

Sofa setup & alignment

Sections joined, frames leveled, legs adjusted to remove wobble, and cushions aligned for clean, even spacing and a soft matte look.

Process

  1. Preparation — inspect pieces, verify hardware, and protect flooring.
  2. Assembly — follow manufacturer specs, align joints, adjust hinges.
  3. Finishing — clean surfaces, remove packaging, verify stability.

FAQ

Do you assemble furniture from any brand?

Yes, we handle IKEA, Wayfair, West Elm, and custom orders with all required tools and experience.

Can you assemble outdoor furniture?

Absolutely. We assemble and level patio sets, tighten joints, and ensure long-term stability.

Do you remove packaging and clean afterward?

Yes. We remove all packaging, wipe down surfaces, and leave your space spotless.
